page.title: 05BRADLEY CHURCH
page.content: As you turn right down{Yew tree lane from the{A517, Bradley church}is on the right of the lane. It has parts which are over 600 years old.The main building material for the {church}is stone.The reason the{church does not have a belltower is because the wooden tower was struck by lightning in a storm. The belltower has been replaced by a lightning conductor. The{church}is surrounded by a graveyard in which the oldest grave dates back to 1729. People say that {Oliver Cromwell}knocked the top off a cross in the graveyard and now all that remains is a post.There is a Saxon stone set in one wall with a carving of Adam and Eve. {BY { Helen Phillips
